main event: A woman in Spring Valley, Ohio observed an unidentified flying object on September 3, 1967 around 2:00 AM.
interesting points: The object was a bright red glow, solid and tear drop or pear-shaped.
The object was observed for a few seconds to a minute, descending and then moving up before disappearing to the southeast.
The object lit up the pasture and house area, similar to a sparkler.
The woman's husband also observed the object.
The woman requested a reply from the Air Force about what she observed, stating she was not a 'nut'.
sighted object: a bright red, solid, teardrop or pear-shaped object
photographs: no photographs present in the document
